cause.description:
These two great American patriots have made us laugh for years! They've made fun of countless politicians, so now it's time to see what they can do in office! America, let these two take the reins!
If you want to be an admin just ask
1. They know what America wants!
2. All other candidates blow!
3. The Daily Show and Colbert Report rule!
cause.name: Stewart, Colbert 2008
